mapper.select: SELECT a.passengerId userId,b.imgUrl from carpool a left join usersAccount b on a.passengerId=b.id where a.userCarLogsId=#{userCarLogsId} and a.isComplete=0
SELECT count(1) from carpool where userCarLogsId=#{userCarLogsId} and isComplete=0
select count(1) from carpool where passengerId=#{userId} and now()>createTime and getOffTime>now() and isComplete=0
select count(1) from carpool where driverId=#{userId} and now()>createTime and getOffTime>now() and isComplete=0
